title: Metacognition-Based Self-Awareness Enhancement Course: Strengthening Language Practitioner Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Secondary Education Experience, Practical Experience in Language Instruction, and Basic Digital Literacy
context.additional_context: An online course for in-service secondary language teachers focusing on enhancing metacognition and self-reflection skills through LMS-based asynchronous learning and individualized feedback

learning_goals: Learners can systematically apply metacognitive strategies in lesson design using Apaydin’s 3A approach (Action-Analysis-Application)
Learners can diagnose cognitive deficits in language learners with over 80% accuracy using the Problem-Solving Algorithm (PSA) framework
Learners complete personal reflection portfolios explaining the connection between Bloom’s highest cognitive domain (creating/evaluating) and Maslow’s self-actualization needs
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
